biography.title: Biography
biography.content:
I am a Front-End developer specialized in creating modern and functional web applications. With solid training in web development, I constantly seek new challenges that allow me to evolve professionally. My experience focuses on React, Next.js, TypeScript and the ecosystem of modern tools like Vite, Tailwind CSS and React Query.

My experience combines over 14 years in the tourism industry, specialized in Amadeus GDS systems, with more than 5 years in front-end development. This unique perspective allows me to provide technological solutions that understand both business needs and modern technical standards, using React, TypeScript, and monitoring tools like Grafana Faro to create robust and scalable applications.

I invite you to view my projects in the "Projects" section or by clicking the button below. If you want to know more about me, you can contact me in the "Contact" section.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I work with modern technologies from the React ecosystem, specializing in Next.js for SSR/SSG applications, Zustand for global state management, React Query for data fetching, and Vite for build optimization. I use Tailwind CSS for efficient styling and Framer Motion for advanced animations. My experience also includes TypeScript for type safety, Git for version control, and Grafana Faro for application monitoring.
items: HTML5/CSS3 and CSS frameworks like Tailwind
React Query/TanStack Query for data fetching
React Hook Form for form management
Monitoring with Grafana Faro and Sentry
